long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ğŸ•’ Master Time from Around the World with Our Chrome Extension!

âœ¨ Key Features:

ğŸ†“ FREE and Easy to Use: Our extension is available to everyone at no cost. Installation takes just seconds!

âŒš Display of UTC Time on the Go: Keep accurate Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) at your fingertips, wherever you are.

ğŸŒ Choose Time Zones: Need the time in another city? Easily select any time zone with just one click.

ğŸ¨ Dark/Light theme default support: dark mode designed to reduce eye strain at night.

ğŸ“… Localization of Your Choice: Prefer to see the time and date in your native language? Choose from a wide range of available locales.

ğŸ—£ï¸ Supports Multiple Languages: Our extension speaks your language! We support a broad spectrum of languages for your convenience.

ğŸ‘‰ Time Display on the Extension Badge Icon: Always see the current time right on the extension icon in your browser - convenient and practical.

ğŸŒŸ Why Should You Install Our Extension?

It's perfect for travelers, international teams, students, and anyone who regularly interacts with people in different time zones.
This is a tool that makes tracking time simple and efficient.
You'll always be aware of the time, no matter where you are.
ğŸ’¡ Install our extension now and make managing time simple and convenient!
long.en:

ğŸ†“ FREE and Easy to Use: Our extension is available to everyone at no cost. Installation takes just seconds!

âŒš Display of UTC Time on the Go: Keep accurate Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) at your fingertips, wherever you are.

ğŸŒ Choose Time Zones: Need the time in another city? Easily select any time zone with just one click.

ğŸ¨ Dark/Light theme default support: dark mode designed to reduce eye strain at night.

ğŸ“… Localization of Your Choice: Prefer to see the time and date in your native language? Choose from a wide range of available locales.

ğŸ—£ï¸ Supports Multiple Languages: Our extension speaks your language! We support a broad spectrum of languages for your convenience.

It's perfect for travelers, international teams, students, and anyone who regularly interacts with people in different time zones.
This is a tool that makes tracking time simple and efficient.
You'll always be aware of the time, no matter where you are.
